METHOD.name: getProperty
METHOD.DESC: This method will return the value of the propertyName that is passed in. The propertyName must be a valid property of the API class.

PARAM.name: propertyName
PARAM.DESC: The property to return info about

RETURN.DESC: The property to return info about

METHOD.name: getProperties
METHOD.DESC: This method will return a set of object/value pairs for the list of the propertyName that is passed in. The propertyNames must be a valid property of the API class.

PARAM.name: arrayofNames
PARAM.DESC: List of properties to return info about

RETURN.DESC: Map of properties to return info about

METHOD.name: getAllProperties
METHOD.DESC: This method will return all of object/value pairs for the propertyNames of the API class.

METHOD.name: setProperty
METHOD.DESC: This method will set the value of a property for the API class. The propertyName must be a valid property for the class and must also not be read only.

PARAM.name: propertyName
PARAM.DESC: The one property name to set

PARAM.name: propertyValue
PARAM.DESC: The one property value to set

METHOD.name: setProperties
METHOD.DESC: This method will set the values of a list of properties for the API class. The propertyName must be a valid property for the class and must also not be read only.
